successes.title: Machine of Death: The Game of Creative Assassination
successes.description: A party game in which it is TOTALLY POSSIBLE to drop a boxcar full of rabid piranhas onto the King of France. LIKELY, even

Pledges.description: "JUST THE TIP" – A couple dimes in the tip jar! Thanks so much! This will make you eligible for any digital rewards that go to all backers.
"ELECTROCUTED" – [PDF only] A digital version of the cards & rulebook for you to print out, plus any other digital-only rewards that'll go to all backers.

"VOLTAGE" [PDF + Expansion Cards] A digital print-n-play version of the rulebook, the base game cards, the Webcomics Pals stretch goal cards, and the blank cards – so far we're at ELECTROCUTED – and then we add ALL of the expansion cards from the Sidecar Box.

"TÖDLICHER SCHLAG" [Deutsches PDF] – Eine digitale Version der Karten und des Regelwerks in Deutsch zum Selber-Ausdrucken. Zusätzlich erhaltet ihr alle anderen Belohnungen, die auf digitale Versionen beschränkt sind und an alle Unterstützer gehen. Das beinhaltet das Grundspiel, leere Kartenvorlagen, und die Karten aus den "Webcomic Pals" Verlängerungs-Zielen. Für mehr Erweiterungs-Packs, siehe HOCHSPANNUNG.

"HOCHSPANNUNG" [Deutsches PDF + Erweiterungen PDF] – Eine digitale Version des Regelwerks und jeder Karte, die wir in dieser Aktion anbieten, in Deutsch. Ihr bekommt das Grundspiel, leere Kartenvorlagen, die Karten aus den "Webcomic Pals" Verlängerungs-Zielen, und alle Erweiterungs-Packs (im Moment 300 weitere Karten, aber weitere könnten hinzugefügt werden, bevor die Aktion ausläuft). Außerdem erhaltet ihr alle digitalen Belohnungen, die an alle Unterstützer gehen.
"GOT PLAYED" – [PDF + Game] One brand-new copy of the physical game! You'll get the PDF and any other digital rewards too.
"BOOKED" – [PDF + Game + Book] Physical and digital versions of the game, plus a copy of the first Machine of Death book! (Our new mass-market "Disposable Edition", handy and pocket-sized.)
"HANGED" – [PDF + Game + Poster] Physical and digital versions of the game, plus an 11 x 14" poster of the game's characters, drawn by Kris Straub!
"TEXTILES" – [PDF + Game + Shirt] Physical and digital versions of the game, plus a Kickstarter-exclusive "Zoo in a Can" T-shirt designed by Kris Straub!
"DUEL" – [Game x 2] Two copies of the physical game! Plus all digital rewards (such as the PDF).
"PILED ON" – [PDF + Game + Shirt + Poster + Book] Physical and digital versions of the game; the shirt and poster; plus a copy of the first MOD book.

"SIDECAR" – [PDF + Game + Expansion Sets] Physical and digital versions of the game, plus a second, matching game box with all available expansion cards (and room for the stretch goal cards as well). This comes with the 300 extra death cards previously only on the Add-On page, plus any other expansion cards that may be added later in the campaign.
"INFAMY" – Anything from PILED ON that you like, plus YOU GET TO MAKE UP a new death card that will be included in every copy of the game! You'll also be credited in the rulebook.

"SPINDLED" – [PDF + Game + Book + Expansion Cards] This is SIDECAR with the addition of a copy of the first MOD book. (Our handy, compact Disposable Edition!) You get the game, the book, and a second box with any & all expansion cards (of which there are currently 300; it's possible that more may be added as the campaign progresses).

"COMMERCE" – [Retailer pack of 6 x games] Only valid for actual game stores that are for-real businesses run by grownups! We will ask for verification of this with Business Questions like "HOW ARE YOU ZONED?" and "SALES TAX??" and possibly even "FAX US YOUR YELLOW PAGES LISTING"
"EARLY BIRD" – Anything from PILED ON that you like, plus a pre-street advance copy of THIS IS HOW YOU DIE (the Machine of Death sequel), shipped a few months earlier than the game itself! :O
"DRAWN; QUARTERED" – Anything from PILED ON that you like, plus Kris Straub will make YOUR LIKENESS one of the victims that is killed in the game's official rulebook!

"BOXED IN" – [Deluxe game] Your copy of the game will come in an exclusive super-deluxe wooden box with a laser-etched cover. This version includes 300 extra death cards, an official Signature Certificate with Kris & David's signatures, plus a Mission Log for you to keep a record of the craziest details in your games. (Also includes the digital rewards, but not the shirt, poster, or book.)

"FORKLIFT ACCIDENT" – [Retailer pack of 12 x games] Only valid for real actual game stores that are real! For example they might have one of those fancy OPEN/CLOSED signs that you turn around in the window??

"LUXURY" – Everything in PILED ON, plus your copy of the game will come in an exclusive super-deluxe wooden box with a laser-etched cover. This version includes extra death cards, an official Signature Certificate with Kris & David's signatures, plus a Mission Log for you to keep a record of the craziest details in your games.
"TYCOON" – This is LUXURY + INFAMY. You get the deluxe game box, plus all PILED ON rewards, PLUS you get to make up a death card OR category card to be included in the game!

"GOAT STARE" – Any lesser tier that you want (except EARLY BIRD), PLUS we show your copy of the game to a goat before we ship it to you. (Photographic proof provided.) Non-US backers, please add the listed shipping cost of the reward tier you want.

"CONTAINMENT" – Any lesser tier that you want (except EARLY BIRD), PLUS we package your copy of the game in any random container we have sitting around the house. No predictions or guarantees on what that might be. No refunds. (Non-US backers, please add the listed shipping cost of the reward tier you want.)

"IMPACT" – Any lesser tier that you want (except EARLY BIRD), PLUS your copy of the game ships completely destroyed. Includes a video of us destroying your copy of the game specifically, and calling you names while we do it. (Non-US backers, please add the listed shipping cost of the reward tier you want.)

"DEMENTIA" – Any lesser tier that you want (except EARLY BIRD), EXCEPT that your copy of the game features COMPLETELY BLANK CARDS. No printing on the cards whatsoever. (Non-US backers, please add the listed shipping cost of the reward tier you want.)

"PENNED" – Any lesser tier that you want (except EARLY BIRD), EXCEPT that your copy of the game features COMPLETELY BLANK CARDS that I have PERSONALLY HANDWRITTEN all the info back onto. (Non-US backers, please add the listed shipping cost of the reward tier you want.)
"CONTACT" – Everything in LUXURY (including the deluxe game box), plus David & Kris will play the game with you and your friends via Skype!

"FROM ABOVE" – You become the SPONSOR of 15 extra cards added to the base game. We'll work with you to craft them, and you'll also get everything in LUXURY (including the deluxe game box). You'll be credited in the rulebook as well.
"VISITATION" – Everything in LUXURY, plus David & Kris will COME TO YOUR HOUSE and play the game with you AND BRING PIZZA!! (US/Canada only, please)

"CAR" – Any tier TYCOON or lesser that you want (except EARLY BIRD), PLUS a car, delivered to your house or place of business. Registration transferred into your name. You do not get to choose what kind of car it is, nor the condition of the car, but you will own it. (US only.)

"BAD DECISIONS" – A 4-hour MP3 of garbled, distorted, unlistenable wails of your name, screeched over and over and over and over by the foulest voices we can summon. No copy of the game is included with this tier. (To add a copy of the game, use our Add-On page.)
